Package org.webcurator.core.util

Interface Summary
Auditor The Auditor Interface defines the audit methods that an audit implementation must support.
 

Class Summary
ApplicationContextFactory The ApplicationContextFactory holds a reference to the WebApplicationContext so that the Spring WebApplicationContext can be accessed by objects that do not have access to the ServletContext.
AuditDAOUtil Common helper utility to carry out Auditing of actions within the WCT system.
AuthUtil authUtil can be used to query the logged in users credentials and also obtain the fully populated WCT User object.
ConverterUtil  
CookieUtils A set of cookie utilities.
DateUtils A set of useful date methods.
LockManager The LockManager is responsible for managing Pessimistic locks.
Utils A set of static utilities that can be reused throughout the WCT.
WCTSoapCall WCTSoapCall abstracts some of the SOAP mechanics from the rest of the WCT, allowing the WCT to be relatively free of SOAP related functionality.
WebServiceEndPoint A class to encapsulate a web service end point.
XMLConverter
